name: Don't be afraid of the dark (YedaBhagwandas)
name_original: Don't be afraid of the dark (YedaBhagwandas)
description:
--DON'T BE AFRAID OF THE DARK--

A First-Person Adventure game where you are stuck inside a haunted building, where you have to perform few tasks in order to find the passcode to the exit of the building, all this while running away from the ghost in the fog who's scared of UV Flashlight! so don't forget to use it.

WASD-Movement
Left MouseClick - Interact
Right MouseClick - Toggle UV Flashlight
'E' button - Pickup Batteries for UV Flashlight
